QuestData.Title: Upward and Onward
QuestData.Description:
It is sad dat Hir'eek had to die, but at least de blood trolls are weaker now.
My potions are healing me up nicely. I did some looking around and came across dis guy.
He's skittish, but not hostile. I think you can use him to get out of here.
Hurry up and jump on, before he breaks de rope! I'll find my own way out; you don't have to worry.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Zo'bal Ruins and inform Witch Doctor Kejabu as to what happened.

Objectives.Objective: Flight out of Hir'eek's Lair secured
